content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Hello Juan, it's nice to meet you. Thank you for considering our apartment for rent. Based on your interest and the fact that you are a student, we are willing to offer you a rental price of €500 per month. This price includes all utilities and is subject to a one-year lease agreement. What do you think?
name: Juan Mamani

content:
Thanks for the offer, but I would like to negotiate a little bit. I was thinking of €450 per month.

Thank you for your understanding.

Best regards, Juan.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Of course, Juan. We understand that you want to negotiate and we are open to discussing a lower rental price. Based on your suggestion of €450 per month, we are willing to agree to that price. We appreciate your willingness to communicate openly and we look forward to having you as our tenant. Thank you for considering our apartment. Best regards, Mister Heine.
name: Juan Mamani

content:
Alright, I agree to the price of €450 per month.

Thank you for your understanding, Mister Heine.

Best regards, Juan.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I'm glad to hear that you have agreed to the price of €450 per month, Juan. Thank you for your interest in our apartment and we look forward to having you as our tenant. If you have any further questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to let us know. Best regards, Mister Heine.
name: Juan Mamani
